name: very-long-chain acyl-CoA:malonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (decarboxylating)
definition: Very-long-chain acyl-CoA + Malonyl-CoA <=> Very-long-chain 3-oxoacyl-CoA + CO2 + CoA
comment: Elongation of C16/C18 acyl-CoAs to very-long-chain acyl CoAs.
